materials: Base metal plated with Gold. Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds. Emerald green stones. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic South Indian design with a modern geometric chevron pattern and a large, ornate pendant. The pendant and chain are connected by floral motifs, each studded with a vibrant emerald green stone at the center. Delicately crafted heart-shaped drops hang from the central segment to provide a graceful movement and enhance the overall aesthetic. The combination of diamond and emerald creates a royal look.
colors: Predominantly gold and diamond white with striking emerald green accents.
occasions: and grand festivals. A stunning choice for bridal jewelry or for wearing to auspicious occasions like Seemantham or a half-saree function (Langa Voni function)
description: This Haaram blends the timeless elegance of South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The high-quality CZ diamonds provide exceptional sparkle, while the emerald accents add a touch of regal charm. Crafted with meticulous detail and finished with Hyderabadi polish, this piece is both durable and beautiful.
